title: Rachael Finch reveals why marriage to Michael Miziner has been a success
text:
She celebrated her sixth wedding anniversary to husband Michael Miziner earlier this year.

And on Sunday, Rachael Finish revealed that regular child-free date nights have been very important in keeping the spark in her marriage alive.

Taking to Instagram on Sunday, she wrote: 'It’s challenging to manage at times, but I think spending a night every now & then with my husband to enjoy good food & our own company is essential for our marriage.'

'I couldn't imagine loving him more!' Rachael Finish (pictured) has revealed that regular child-free date nights has been important in keeping the spark in her marriage alive

She added: 'We get quality time to talk about a lot more than the day to day schedule and remind ourselves what we fell in love with all those years ago.'

'I couldn’t imagine loving Michael Miziner more now than I did on our wedding day, but I do,' she continued.

Rachael said that regular dinners and outings as a couple ensure that they continue to appreciate one another.

Fairytale: Rachael fell in love with her husband Michael Miziner (pictured) after meeting on the celebrity edition of Dancing with the Stars in 2010

Date night: Rachael said that spending quality time together is important as it means they can 'continuously make an effort for one another'

'I truly believe a big part of that has been ensuring we continuously make an effort for one other,' she wrote.

She also shared a snap of herself wearing a purple dress ahead of her date night with her husband on Sunday.

The model flaunted her pins and toned physique in the figure-hugging dress as she made her way to a restaurant.

Flaunt it! On Sunday, Rachael took to Instagram to share a snap of herself ahead of her date night with her husband

Michael also took to Instagram to gush about his beautiful wife ahead of their night out, writing: 'This is my goddess and yes, I am one lucky man!!!'

Rachael and Michael fell in love after meeting on the celebrity edition of Dancing with the Stars in 2010.

They tied the knot in January 2013 and share two children: daughter Violet, five, and son Dominic, one.
description: She celebrated her sixth wedding anniversary to husband Michael Miziner earlier this year.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
